name: EGGBIRD
description:
A myterious loophole in the EGGBIRD space time continuum has caused all of EGGBIRD's eggs to be displaced. EGGBIRD's beloved EGGS are scattered across the world of EGGBIRD and only you can help EGGBIRD EGGBIRD her EGGBIRDS. 

PC Controls:

Right Key - Move Right

Left Key - Move Left

Space - Fly

This demo has four playable levels.

Feedback is welcome and needed!

Happy Eggbirding!
